inputsClass.name: alarms
inputsClass.rawdescription: Input property for receiving a list of alarms.
inputsClass.description: Input property for receiving a list of alarms.

inputsClass.name: isInitialLoading
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Controls the visibility of the loading bar
When set to `false`, the alarm list is displayed. When set to `true`, the opacity of alarms list is changed and a loading bar is shown.
inputsClass.description: Controls the visibility of the loading bar When set to false, the alarm list is displayed. When set to true, the opacity of alarms list is changed and a loading bar is shown.

inputsClass.name: loadMoreMode
inputsClass.rawdescription: Input property for receiving load more mode.
inputsClass.description: Input property for receiving load more mode.

inputsClass.name: navigationOptions
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Defines options, how the alarm list should be navigated if a user
clicks on an alarm.
inputsClass.description: Defines options, how the alarm list should be navigated if a user clicks on an alarm.

inputsClass.name: splitView
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Controls the visibility and functionality of some components
When set to `true`, means the list is displayed in a split view layout:
the list on the first column and the selected record detail on the second column (the cockpit
alarms view for example)
When set to false, the list is displayed as a standalone component, opening the detail will
redirect to the alarms
inputsClass.description: Controls the visibility and functionality of some components When set to true, means the list is displayed in a split view layout: the list on the first column and the selected record detail on the second column (the cockpit alarms view for example) When set to false, the list is displayed as a standalone component, opening the detail will redirect to the alarms

inputsClass.name: typeFilters
inputsClass.rawdescription: Input property for the currently applied type filters.
inputsClass.description: Input property for the currently applied type filters.

outputsClass.name: onScrollingStateChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits a boolean value indicating the scrolling state: true when the user starts scrolling, and false when the user reaches the top of the list.
outputsClass.description: Emits a boolean value indicating the scrolling state: true when the user starts scrolling, and false when the user reaches the top of the list.

outputsClass.name: onSelectedAlarm
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits an instance of a selected alarm when one is chosen from the list.
outputsClass.description: Emits an instance of a selected alarm when one is chosen from the list.

propertiesClass.name: activeAlarm$
propertiesClass.description: Current alarm or last alarm marked as active by the routerLinkActive directive.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Current alarm or last alarm marked as active by the routerLinkActive directive.

propertiesClass.name: alarmBadgeTooltip
alarmLastOccurrenceLabel
propertiesClass.defaultValue: gettext('Last occurrence of this alarm (device time).')

propertiesClass.name: isEmptyListLoading
propertiesClass.description: Determines whether the c8y-loading component should be displayed. The loading component is shown when no alarms are displayed in the view or when the request is initial, as we don't want to see empty space on alarm list during loading.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Determines whether the c8y-loading component should be displayed.
The loading component is shown when no alarms are displayed in the view or when the request is initial,
as we don't want to see empty space on alarm list during loading.

propertiesClass.name: mapAlarmLink

methodsClass.name: activeRouteChanged
methodsClass.rawdescription: Handles the change of the active route.
methodsClass.description: Handles the change of the active route.

jsdoctags.comment: • A boolean indicating whether the route is active or not.
• The ListItemComponent used as a scroll anchor.
• The IAlarm object representing the active alarm.
